resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105307</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105307</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974059</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Seasonal Migrations: Signs of Spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saisonmigrationen: Zeichen des Frühlinges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transferts Saisonniers : Signes de ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Migrações Seasonal: Sinais da mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansioni Stagionali: Segni della molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εποχιακές μεταναστεύσεις: Σημάδια της άνοιξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Migraciones Estacionales: Muestras del 
resorte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Through these interrelated investigations, students discover that sunlight drives all living systems and they learn about the dynamic ecosystem that surrounds and connects them. Guidelines, lessons, activities, reading connections, and interactive maps are included for each study.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durch diese zusammenhängend Untersuchungen 
entdecken Kursteilnehmer, daß Tageslicht alle lebenden Systeme 
antreibt und sie über das dynamische Oekosystem erlernen, das sie 
umgibt und anschließt. Korrekturlinien, Lektionen, 
Aktivitäten, Anschlüsse und interaktive Karten lesend sind für jede
Studie enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par ces investigations en corrélation, les 
étudiants découvrent que la lumière du soleil pilote tous les 
systèmes vivants et ils se renseignent sur l'écosystème dynamique 
qui les entoure et relie. Les directives, leçons, activités, 
lisant des connexions, et des cartes interactives sont incluses pour 
chaque étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com estas investigações relacionadas, os 
estudantes descobrem que a luz solar dirige todos os sistemas vivos e 
aprendem sobre o ecosystem dinâmico que os cerca e conecta. Os 
guidelines, lições, atividades, lendo conexões, e mapas interativos
são incluídos para cada estudo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con queste indagini correlate, gli allievi 
scoprono che la luce solare guida tutti i sistemi viventi ed imparano 
circa l'ecosistema dinamico che li circonda e collega. La guida 
di riferimento, lezioni, attività, leggendo i collegamenti ed i 
programmi interattivi è inclusa per ogni studio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσω αυτών των αλληλένδετων ερευνών, οι σπουδαστές 
ανακαλύπτουν ότι το φως του ήλιου οδηγεί όλα τα συστήματα 
διαβίωσης και μαθαίνουν για το δυναμικό οικοσύστημα που τις 
περιβάλλει και συνδέει. Οι οδηγίες, μαθήματα, 
δραστηριότητες, διαβάζοντας τις συνδέσεις, και τους διαλογικούς 
χάρτες συμπεριλαμβάνονται για κάθε μελέτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con estas investigaciones correlacionadas, los 
estudiantes descubren que la luz del sol conduce todos los sistemas 
vivos y aprenden sobre el ecosistema dinámico que los rodea y 
conecta. Las guías de consulta, lecciones, actividades, leyendo
conexiones, y correspondencias interactivas son incluidas para cada 
estudio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974059</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105307</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/seasonal-migrations-signs-of-spring</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
